Body:
try:
    DF = DataFile('/nope.txt')
    assert False
except:
    assert True
try:
    DF = DataFile('Data/CAMEA_Full.xml')
    assert False
except:
    assert True
files = ['Data/camea2018n000137.hdf', 'Data/camea2018n000137.nxs']
DF1 = DataFile(files[0])
assertFile(files[1])
DF2 = DataFile(files[1])
s = str(DF2)
sampleS = str(DF2.sample)
print(str(DF1.sample))
print(str(DF2.sample))
assert DF1.sample == DF2.sample
